title: Equipping Farmers with AI: Enabling Next-Gen Farming
narration: Welcome to the future of agriculture This presentation explores how the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare is empowering farmers through Artificial Intelligence paving the way for inclusive growth resilience and abundance in farming.

title: Vision: Empowering Farmers with AI
content:
Empowering every farmer with AI.
Inclusive growth and resilience.
A future of abundance in agriculture.
image_desc: Farmer using tablet in field. Type: stock photo
narration: Our vision is clear to empower every farmer with the transformative power of Artificial Intelligence. This initiative aims to foster inclusive growth build resilience against challenges and create a future of abundance for all involved in agriculture.

title: Core Pillars of AI Empowerment
content:
Information Dissemination: Tailored updates.
Disaster Management: Early warning systems.
Skill Development: Interactive learning platforms.
Sustainability Planning: Tools for eco-friendly farming.
Real-Time Analytics: Immediate insights.
Advisory Systems: Personalized farmer support.
image_desc: Icons representing information, disaster, skills, sustainability, analytics, advisory. Type: infographic
narration: The AI empowerment strategy rests on several key pillars. These include providing tailored information enhancing disaster management fostering skill development promoting sustainability offering realtime analytics and delivering personalized advisory systems to support farmers throughout the crop lifecycle.

title: Vision 2030: Key Initiatives
content:
Integrated Farmer IDs
Digital Advisory Expansion
Resilient Agriculture Practices
Efficient Supply Chains
Financial Inclusion via AI
image_desc: Digital transformation in agriculture. Type: conceptual image
narration: Looking ahead to twenty thirty we have outlined five key initiatives to revolutionize agriculture. These include establishing integrated farmer IDs expanding digital advisory services implementing resilient agricultural practices creating efficient supply chains and fostering financial inclusion through AI.

title: Vision 2030: Integrated Farmer IDs
content:
Unified digital farmer identification system.
Streamlined access to government schemes.
Enhanced benefits for farmers.
image_desc: Farmer holding a digital ID card. Type: stock photo
narration: The first initiative is the creation of Integrated Farmer IDs. This unified digital identification system will streamline access to various government schemes and benefits ensuring that farmers receive the support they need efficiently.

title: Vision 2030: Digital Advisory Expansion
content:
Localized, AI-driven advisory services.
Mobile apps, SMS, and IVR systems.
Accessible information for all farmers.
image_desc: Farmer using mobile app for agriculture. Type: stock photo
narration: Next we aim to expand digital advisory services. By providing localized AIdriven advice through mobile apps SMS and IVR systems we can ensure that farmers have access to the information they need when they need it.

title: Vision 2030: Resilient Agriculture Practices
content:
Pilot programs for climate-resilient crops.
Farming practices across vulnerable regions.
Reducing losses due to climate change.
image_desc: Climate-resilient crops in a field. Type: stock photo
narration: Our third initiative focuses on resilient agriculture practices. We will implement pilot programs for climateresilient crops and farming practices across vulnerable regions aiming to significantly reduce losses caused by climate change.

title: Vision 2030: Efficient Supply Chains
content:
AI-powered predictive tools.
Optimized supply chains.
Reduced post-harvest losses.
image_desc: Optimized agricultural supply chain. Type: infographic
narration: Efficient supply chains are crucial for minimizing waste. We will develop AIpowered predictive tools to optimize supply chains significantly reducing postharvest losses and ensuring that produce reaches consumers efficiently.

title: Vision 2030: Financial Inclusion via AI
content:
Enable digital financial services for farmers.
Enhanced credit scoring.
Increased access to insurance.
image_desc: Digital financial services for farmers. Type: conceptual image
narration: Finally we are committed to financial inclusion through AI. By enabling digital financial services enhancing credit scoring and increasing access to insurance we can empower farmers to manage their finances effectively and build a more secure future.

title: Objective: CROPS
content:
Coordinated Information Flow
Resilient Agricultural Practices
Optimized Supply Chains
Promote Market Access
Support Agri-Finance Ecosystem
image_desc: CROPS acronym in agriculture. Type: infographic
narration: Our objectives are encapsulated in the acronym CROPS. This stands for Coordinated Information Flow Resilient Agricultural Practices Optimized Supply Chains Promote Market Access and Support AgriFinance Ecosystem. These objectives guide our efforts to transform agriculture.

title: Current Initiatives: AI in Action
content:
**Pest & Disease Identification:**
Image analytics: National Pest Surveillance System (NPSS)
**Farmer Advisory:**
AI Chatbot: Kisan e-Mitra
**Agriculture Productivity:**
Predictive Analytics: Yield Estimation
**Kisan Call Center Advisory:**
AI Chatbot: Krishi Saathi
**Farmer's Feedback:**
Voice Enabled: Automated Farmer's Feedback System
**Crop Advisory:**
Personalized region-wise Packages of Practise for various crops
image_desc: Current AI initiatives in agriculture. Type: infographic
narration: Currently we have several AI initiatives in action. These include the National Pest Surveillance System using image analytics the Kisan eMitra AI chatbot for farmer advisory predictive analytics for yield estimation the Krishi Saathi AI chatbot for Kisan Call Center advisory a voiceenabled automated farmer's feedback system and personalized regionwise packages of practice for various crops.

title: Future Initiatives: Expanding AI's Reach
content:
**Crop Identification:**
AI-powered classification of crops using image analytics
**Crop Quality:**
AI-powered Automated grading and sorting for quality checks
**Damage Assessment:**
Crop health assessment post disaster using image analytics
**Customized Content Platform:**
Tailored learning and resources for farmers
image_desc: Future AI initiatives in agriculture. Type: infographic
narration: Looking ahead our future initiatives include AIpowered crop identification using image analytics AIpowered automated grading and sorting for quality checks crop health assessment postdisaster using image analytics and a customized content platform offering tailored learning and resources for farmers.

title: Conclusion: A Future of Abundance
content: AI is transforming agriculture, empowering farmers and creating a sustainable future.
image_desc: Farmers celebrating a successful harvest. Type: stock photo
narration: In conclusion AI is revolutionizing agriculture empowering farmers and creating a sustainable future for all. By embracing these innovative technologies we can ensure a future of abundance and resilience in the agricultural sector.
